body:
Hi Niccolo[
](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/Niccolo844) If you connect a panel to "conditionOfPerson" output you'll see:
line 5: (1, 1, 1)
line 6: (12, 31, 24)
There is a small bug in Ladybug_Adaptive Comfort Calculator. I have fixed it, but I have to ask to Chris if it works fine for all possible cases with this change.
As you can see from the image below, it should be fine. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/b*u3sBO-oVVpIDdEFBnG94cKhc3BMSbtJ21J*VWdXyjRZ0fHrAYHj6JAXVwNqdXMScCVm2TOVK8c6Zurwy5GveE6U24TgIWU/smallbug.png) Best Antonello
